ISSUE.TITLE: DevOps issues
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: - [x] incorrect tag (now it tags one of the combined tags of target one) - [ ] local sdk path - [ ] contributor PR release - npm ERR! need auth You need to authorize this machine using `npm adduser` - Findings: - we may use `pull_request_target` but it needs a way to check if it's a draft or not - security concerns
